keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: A firm favourite!

method.text: Heat the oil in a pan. Add the onion. Cook for 2-3 min until softened. Stir in the chilli powder and cumin. Cook for 1 min.
Add the peanut butter and soy sauce. Heat through gently for 3-5 min until melted and well mixed.
Slowly add the coconut milk to the pan until all is incorporated. Bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer gently for 2-3 min.
Thread the chicken onto pre-soaked bamboo skewers. Mix the oil, soy sauce and seaoning together. Brush over the chicken.
Arrange the skewers on a grill pan. Grill under a preheated medium grill for 8-10 min, turning and basting frequently.
Serve the chicken skewers with the satay sauce.

title: Chicken satay
